name: ads2mssql-importer
description: Import Azure Data Studio saved MSSQL connection profiles into the VS Code ms-mssql extension.

commands.title: Import Azure Data Studio MSSQL Connections

ads2mssql.azureDataStudioSettingsPath.description: Optional override path to Azure Data Studio settings.json (leave blank for auto-detect).

ads2mssql.skipDuplicates.description: Skip importing a connection if an equivalent (server+database+user) already exists.

ads2mssql.importGroups.description: Attempt to import Azure Data Studio connection groups and apply them to imported connections.

ads2mssql.createGroupsInTarget.description: Create missing groups inside the target ms-mssql extension before adding connections (if API allows).

ads2mssql.debugLogging.description: Enable verbose debug logging to the ADS2MSSQL output channel during import.

ads2mssql.writeMode.description: Where to write imported connections: currently only 'settings' (updates mssql.connections in user settings).

ads2mssql.writeGroups.description: Persist group hierarchy into mssql.connectionGroups (settings writeMode).
